articles.title: Apple's Plans for the DMA in the European Union - Daring Fireball
articles.description: The delicious irony in Apple’s not knowing if these massive proposals will be deemed DMA-compliant is that their dealings with the European Commission sound exactly like App Store developers’ dealings with Apple. Do all the work to build it first, and only *t…
articles.content: Apple yesterday announced a broad, wide-ranging, and complex set of new policies establishing their intended compliance with the European Unions Digital Markets Act, which comes into effect March 7. … [+28005 chars]

articles.author: Patrick Smith, Aria Bendix
articles.title: Measles in the U.K.: Health authorities warn outbreak could grow - NBC News
articles.description: A serious outbreak of measles in England could continue to grow, health experts have warned, as Europe grapples with a big spike in the contagious disease.
articles.content:
LONDON A serious outbreak of measles in England could grow to tens of thousands of cases, health experts there have warned, as Europe grapples with a spike in the highly contagious disease.
